circumstances: En route from Oakland to Honolulu, both engines failed. The pilot reduced his altitude and ditch the aircraft off Pacific Grove. The pilot was rescued while the aircraft sank and was lost.
probable_cause:
engine failure in normal cruise due to fuel starvation for undetermined reasons. The following contributing factors were reported:
- Fuel starvation, 
- Complete failure both engines, 
- Forced landing off airport on water, 
- Ferry fuel system installed, 
- High fuel consumption.
